body.p: When an entity presents earnings per share in accordance with IAS 33 Earnings per Share, the entity shall present additional basic and diluted earnings per share, which are calculated using the earnings amounts required by IAS 33 but excluding the movements in regulatory deferral account balances (see paragraphs B13–B14).
